§5§7§7Pay homage to 9 years of SkyWars
§5§7by rocking this awesome kit!
§5§7§9Opals §7only cost §b1,250 §bSouls §7to forge.

§5§7§7Your first §a3 §7Sword kills put a
§5§7§dSharpness §7level on your Sword but
§5§7inflict §c-2 Max ❤§7.
§5§7§7Quests reward §8+0%➜§a+5% §6Coins§7.
§5§7§7Quests reward §8+5%➜§a+10% §6Coins§7.
§5§7§7Quests reward §8+10%➜§a+15% §6Coins§7.
§5§7§7Quests reward §8+15%➜§a+20% §6Coins§7.

§5§7§7An §3Ender Pearl §7replaces the loot in
§5§7one of your island chests. You start
§5§7with only §c7 Max ❤§7.
§5§7Double the dragon, double the flex!
§5§7It's in the name!

§5§7§7Kills and Assists each give an
§5§7additional §b+1 XP§7.

§5§7§7Unlocks a final §a7th Perk Slot §7in
§5§7Normal and Mega Skywars.

§5§7Prestige-ified version of the §6Double
§5§6Dragon Projectile Trail§7.

§5§7bush-inspired emblem.

§5§7Call upon not one, not three, not
§5§7four, but TWO Dragons to descend
§5§7through the map.
